001package net.tvburger.jdl.adaline;
002
003import net.tvburger.jdl.common.numbers.Array;
004import net.tvburger.jdl.model.DataSet;
005import net.tvburger.jdl.model.nn.Neuron;
006import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.ObjectiveFunction;
007import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.Optimizer;
008
009public class LeastMeanSquares implements Optimizer.Stochastic<Adaline, Float> {
010
011    private float learningRate;
012
013    public LeastMeanSquares(float learningRate) {
014        this.learningRate = learningRate;
015    }
016
017    public float getLearningRate() {
018        return learningRate;
019    }
020
021    public void setLearningRate(float learningRate) {
022        this.learningRate = learningRate;
023    }
024
025    @Override
026    public void optimize(Adaline adaline, DataSet.Sample<Float> sample, ObjectiveFunction<Float> objective, int step) {
027        Array<Float> estimated = adaline.estimate(sample.features());
028        Array<Float> gradients = objective.calculateGradient_dJ_da(1, estimated, sample.targetOutputs());
029        for (int j = 0; j < estimated.length(); j++) {
030            Neuron node = adaline.getNeuron(adaline.getDepth(), j, Neuron.class);
031            float errorSignal = -1 * gradients.get(j);
032            for (int d = 1; d <= sample.featureCount(); d++) {
033                node.getNeuronFunction().adjustParameter(d, learningRate * errorSignal * sample.features().get(d - 1));
034            }
035            node.adjustParameter(0, learningRate * errorSignal);
036        }
037    }
038}
